**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Log**
grab the log file respective to your current session, you can grab the log file on ~/.mimiq/log/yyyymmddhhmmss.log

with
yyyy -> year (2020)
mm -> month (12)
dd -> day (31)
hh -> hour (23)
mm -> minute(59)
ss -> second(59)
